name: Venom Maw Hydra
description: The Venom Maw Hydra is characterized by its five heads and powerful acid-based attacks. This monstrous creature has a serpentine body and multiple biting heads, making it a terrifying enemy in both water and land.
memorable: The ability to regenerate heads when injured makes the Venom Maw Hydra a persistent threat in battle.
goals: To dominate its environment and defeat foes using its overwhelming attacks.
relations: Other hydra varieties or aquatic creatures.
environment: Lurks in swamps, rivers, or aquatic environments.
strengths: Immunity to acid and high hit points provide resilience, while multiple heads allow for multiple attacks.
weaknesses: Takes extra damage from cold attacks, which also prevent its head regeneration.
attacks: Utilizes multiattack with powerful bite and spit attacks dealing piercing and acid damage.
most_powerful_ability: Its regeneration ability allows it to regrow heads killed in battle, unless cold damage is inflicted.
senses: Possesses keen perception with a passive score of 18.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Stealth, allowing it to be both aware of its surroundings and capable of ambush.
additional_information: Regains 10 HP for each head regrown.
Advantage on saving throws due to multiple heads.
Can attack in both melee and ranged forms.
Wallowing Rampage can deal area damage in water.
Wakeful ability prevents it from being caught off guard while it sleeps.
test_queries: dangerous creature that can grow heads
creature with powerful bite and spit
